lead_paragraph: Ohio State’s president, E. Gordon Gee, spent the day touring a home for the elderly in northwest Ohio operated by Little Sisters of the Poor to atone for a remark he made last fall.
snippet: Ohio State’s president, E. Gordon Gee, spent the day touring a home for the elderly in northwest Ohio operated by Little Sisters of the Poor to atone for a remark he made last fall.
